doc:
Manuel Padilla Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manuel_Padilla_Jr. 0 Manuel Padilla Jr. (July 13, 1955 – January 29, 2008) was an American actor. He is best remembered for playing Jai on Ron Ely's Tarzan television series of the mid to late 1960s and for appearing in American Graffiti (1973). As a child, he also appeared on episodes of Rawhide, Bonanza, Gunsmoke and The Flying Nun.Manuel Padilla Jr. died of brain cancer in 2008. He was 52. Manuel_Padilla_Jr. ( July_13_,_1955 – January_29_,_2008 ) was an_American_actor . He is_best_remembered for playing Jai on Ron_Ely 's_Tarzan_television_series of the_mid to late_1960s and for appearing in American_Graffiti_(_1973_) . As a_child , he also appeared on episodes of Rawhide , Bonanza , Gunsmoke and The_Flying_Nun.Manuel_Padilla_Jr. died of brain_cancer in 2008 . He was 52 .
